title: Strengthening Learning Design Practice Competencies: Flexible Information Utilization Strategies for Medical Students

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and appropriately select at least three types of medical information sources based on context

Learners can search for five or more academic databases (DBpia, RISS) and digital resources (PDFs, e-books) on mobile devices (smartphones/tablets), systematically register three or more selected materials into a reference management tool (e.g., Zotero), and apply proper citation methods two or more times in assignments.
Learners can systematically compile information collection/analysis results into reports through team-based projects

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
